name: Visual Studio Content File
summary: Learn about .VSCONTENT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: VSCONTENT files are typically compressed along with the component files into a single archive using ZIP compression. The resulting archive can be turned into a Visual Studio Content Installer (.VSI) File by changing the file extension from ".zip" to ".vsi".

description: Text file that describes the content of a Visual Studio package; includes the filename, display name, description, file type, and content version of each file; used for describing Visual Studio items shared as community components.
